entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 8:31 PM PDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:31 PM PDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 8:31 PM PDT Sunday 19 March 2023
